import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Card, Button, Row, Col, Accordion } from 'react-bootstrap'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import Placeholder from '../style/unnamed.png'; const Cards = ({ data }) => { let cast = data.cast let actors; return (
Movie Title: {data.title} {data.plot} Trailer Year: {data.year}.
Movie length:{data.length}.
Movie rating: {data.rating} Read more Cast: cast.map
) } Cards.propTypes = { data: PropTypes.object } export default Cards;
